channel.title: Npc sendmessage
channel.description: how i can make a thing when i kill a npc it should say sendmessage: u killed this monster ang gain 1 pk points then show the points u have?

item.title: Npc sendmessage
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Null Amount, post:4, topic:531964”]It’s probably not copy and paste.

Put it wherever your server handles NPCs. In Delta sources, it’s NpcHandler, I’m not sure about PI.[/quote]
Same spot lol.
Just after the for loop, where you see the appendSlayerExp stuff.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Null_Amount wrote:

It’s probably not copy and paste.

Put it wherever your server handles NPCs. In Delta sources, it’s NpcHandler, I’m not sure about PI.

item.title: Npc sendmessage
item.dc:creator: @i_pwn_u11 i_pwn_u1
item.description:
@i_pwn_u11 wrote:

[quote=“RandQm, post:2, topic:531964”]if (npc.getId() == #)
player.sendMessage(“You earned # pk points for killing this monster. You now have “+player.getPkPoints()+” points.”);[/quote]

where do i put that?

Read full topic
